channel.title: jQuery Problem

item.title: jQuery Problem
item.dc:creator: @Wewt Wewt
item.description:
@Wewt wrote:

Hi there.
So today I figured I was fed up with regular Javascript coding, and decided to look into jQuery and implement it.
Now, I’m just trying to do a dummy function, and it’s not working. Firebug is telling me that “$ is not defined”. I feel really dumb for asking this. My code:

<script type="text/javascript"> $(document).ready(function(){ $("#test").val("This should be there"); }); </script>
I’ve checked to make sure that jQuery is included (I’m using the minimized version, if that changes anything). I really can’t figure this out

holy crap I’m dumb. I was using instead of . I’ve gotten too used to code completion.

Read full topic
